comment.author: 37364511@N06
comment._content: I'm going to guess this is facing west because I can just make out channel 6 antenna.

comment.author: 38254353@N05
comment._content: That service station on the south side of Broad is still there, and the Crazy Greek is in the building behind it.

comment.author: 56077378@N06
comment._content: There was to be built a White Tower Diner on the northwest corner of Staples Mill and Broad {vacant spot} and a bike store behind it,both gone now. Then next to the White Tower will be a Krisby Kreme. KK may still be there? On the Northeast corner was a  Plymouth Dealership but it's gone too I think.

comment.author: 38254353@N05
comment._content: The bike shop is still there, but not in the original building connected to the White Tower.  An EXXON station is where the White tower was.  The Plymouth dealer closed when Chrysler did away with that brand....the Blue Cross building expanded into that space, and it's now a parking lot for the building on the corner
